attributes.action: Var at all EFL play off finals
attributes.additional_details: Many wrong decision have been made by officials and it's time in such important one off games they have assistance...var will be introduced in all EPL games from next season so it's importance has been recognised
attributes.background: Getting promoted  is a major boost to a club and it's home town or city  , the extra finance can mean a secure future so it is important that the correct decisions are made by officials for the sake of fair play and any form of cheating to gain an advantage is prevented
